DLG a
I'm a cat

DLG d
Across the street a cyclist free-wheeled. His black dog ran alongside him with long loping strides.

DLG e
The dog was sleek and lithe and joyful as only a dog can be.

DLG f
Then they passed under a streetlight...

DLG g
Hmm

DLG i
Or maybe our best friends stay with us.

DLG j
...maybe...

DLG h
And the dog was gone.

DLG k
Was it a trick of the light? A figment of spokes and shadows?

DLG l
One evening I took my dog for a walk around the neighbourhood.

DLG q
I am the moon. You shouldn't be here.
